title: Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn advanced LLM features on or off
abstract:
# Vertex AI Search and Conversation - Turn advanced LLM features on or off
This page describes how to turn [advanced LLM features](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/about-advanced-features#advanced-llm-features) on or off for an app.
content:
## Before you begin
If you're turning on advanced LLM features, be aware of additional costs that this can incur. See [Pricing](/generative-ai-app-builder/pricing) .
Make sure that any app for which you turn off advanced LLM features doesn't require these features. For example, if you have deployed a search widget that uses search with follow-ups, Google recommends that you change the search type to "single-turn without summarization" before turning off advanced LLM features. After turning advanced LLM features off, all features that require advanced LLM stop working in your app within a few minutes.
Features that require advanced LLM include:
- [Search summaries](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/get-search-summaries) 
- [Search with follow-ups](/generative-ai-app-builder/docs/multi-turn-search) ## Turn advanced LLM features on or off
To turn advanced LLM features on or off, follow these steps:
- In the Google Cloud console, go to the **Search and Conversation** page. [Search and Conversation](https://console.cloud.google.com/gen-app-builder/engines) 
- Click the app for which you want to change advanced LLM features.
- In the navigation menu, click **Configurations** .
- Click the **Advanced** tab.
- In the **Advanced LLM features** pane, click the toggle on or off.
- Click **Save** . Your changes take place within a few minutes.
